|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-AR1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== AVM supply has 3 different OEM firmware versions for the 7490. At this time, it is known that Germany use AnnexB, while international use AnnexA so at a minimum, there must be at least 2 hardware versions, but with the 3rd firmware image for Belgium there might even be 3 different hardware versions of this device. The bulk of the documentation below is based on the International version of the 7490 (which also had markings for AU/NZ included in few places).
*{{boxmatrix|7490}} :AC1750 WLAN Modem Router (HW185) - VDSL/ADSL2+, DECT, Media Server :CPU: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80920, xDSL: PSB 80190 (VRX208), RAM: 256MB :mips34_512MB_xilinx_vdsl_dect446_4geth_2ab_isdn_nt_te_pots_2usb_host :AC1750 3x3 MU-MIMO, 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 2x USB 3.0 ports <!-- ===Specifications=== :CPU: [[Lantiq (Intel)]] GRX550, WLAN: 2x [[QCA]] QCA9984 :PXB4583EL2000 (SLLZR) 2x @1.0GHz ([[MIPS 34Kc]]) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX30LF4GE8AB-TI (512MB NAND) :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC256M16DP-DI (512MB DDR3) :xDSL AFE: [[Lantiq]] PSB 80318 M V1.2 (XWAY VRX318) :FPGA: ''Xilinx'' Spartan XC6SLX4; DECT: ''Dialog'' SC14446 --> ==Links of Interest== *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/avm/fritzbox.7490 ''AVM FRITZ!Box 7490'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.teltarif.de/router/avm-fritzbox/aufgeschraubt-7490.html?page=5 ''AVM FRITZ!Box 7490'' Teardown on '''TelTarif'''] <!-- ===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/fritz/fritzbox-7590-ac2600/ ''FRITZ!Box 7590 AC2600'' on '''RedesZone'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.ip-phone-forum.de/threads/das-innenleben-einer-7580-platinen-bilder.287251/ On '''iP-phone''' forums] *[https://www.onlinekosten.de/forum/showthread.php?t=147622&page=6 On '''OnlineKosten''' forums] *[http://extreme.pcgameshardware.de/internet-und-netzwerk/265117-howto-dsl-leitungstuning-oder-wie-hole-ich-einfach-mehr-heraus-157.html On '''PCGamesHardware''' forums] -->
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/avm/avm_fritzbox7490 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/avm/fritz.box.7490 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/support-fritzbox-7490/4112 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = lantiq |subtarget = xrx200 |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = WiFi, DECT, ISDN |comment = }} #Check which NAND the device has by using the following procedure with stock firmware: #Go to to ''<nowiki>http://192.168.178.1/support.lua</nowiki>'' download the support data file and search for string "NAND device" to get the manufacturer kernel output. #Use Micron image if Micron is displayed otherwise the non-Micron image. #Use the [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openwrt/openwrt/master/scripts/flashing/eva_ramboot.py eva_ramboot.py] script to boot the initramfs image. Follow the procedure to interrupt booting by ftp into 192.168.178.1 within 5 seconds after poweron. #Then transfer the sysupgrade image to the device and run sysupgrade to flash it to the NAND. #For making USB work, an renesas xhci firmware file (e.g. v2026) is needed and it should be copied to /lib/firmware/ (file name renesas_usb_fw.mem).
→ [https://openwrt.org/docs/guide-user/installation/generic.flashing Install OpenWrt]
